name: MovieGeek
0:
”Alexa, talk to movie geek”
”open movie geek”
”ask movie geek”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie geek
des: This skill will help people become aware of many rare and lesser-known facts of the film world which would surely make every movie watcher and movie enthusiast spellbound! It contains a set of amazing and enticing facts about the film industry and movie world which not only serves as random facts but can even help people out while preparing for any quiz competition.
